prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has elegant features and a graceful swimming style.
I want a fairy-type Pokemon with sparkling fins and a melodic voice.
Generate an aquatic creature with a stunning blue and white color palette.
Make a humanoid Pokemon that embodies the beauty of ocean life and has flowing hair.
Imagine a Pokemon design that combines elements of mermaids with mythical sea creatures.
Design a Pokemon that excels in special attacks and has a captivating appearance.
Show me a Pokemon that can charm its opponents with song and dance.
